title.value: Особенности формирования и оценка продуктивности пастбищных травостоев интенсивного типа в условиях Гродненской области [Беларусь]
Features of formation and evaluation of productivity of pasture plant stands of intensive type in the Grodno region [Belarus]
Features of formation and evaluation of productivity of pasture plant stands of intensive type in the Grodno region [Belarus]

journal.title: Land Reclamation : scientific and practical journal

person.name: Meerovskij, A.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation
Gavrikov, S.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Grodno Regional Inst. of Plant Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the peculiarities of formation and evaluation of productivity of pasture herbage of intensive type. In course of the study there were developed the pasture grass mixtures of intensive type for their use on sod-podzolic soils of the republic. The grass mixtures were created on the basis of perennial grasses of the recognized varieties. Found that mixtures based on domestic breeding of perennial grasses can form at the level of productivity of imports, providing (averaged over four years) 6,70-8,23 t/ha of dry matter, 4,44-5,47 t/ha of forage units, ensuring feed unit of digestible protein at 135-142 grams. Creation of pasture grass stands on the basis of perennial grasses provided on the first year 12.8-22.0% of leguminous crops in their structure. By the seconf year their amount grew up to 23.6-39.6%. By the fourth year the rate of white clover (Trifolium repens) was at the level 35.7-66.3%.
